column6: The X-Men take one step closer to discovering the true identity of the mysterious telepath haunting their lives. Plus, Bogan's strange connection to X-Corp and the Hellfire Club is revealed! 32 PGS.(each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99 (each)
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Igor Kordey | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
